welcomeOfferBanner.description: Create your account and get 10% off your first request made through the app. Registration is required to manage your bookings and access exclusive offers.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Seamless, transparent, and reliable
howItWorks.description: Our process is designed to make your life easier. Submit your request in just a few steps, receive a personalized offer, and get professional help exactly when you need it. We value communication, reliability, and flexibility in every service we provide.

steps.title: Request Service
steps.description: Submit your details online or by phone – quick, simple, and directly through our app.

steps.title: Receive Offer
steps.description: We review your needs and send you a personalized service offer to your request.

steps.title: Get the Service
steps.description: Our professionals complete the service at your preferred time, reliably and with care.

story.title: A Young Company with a Clear Vision
paragraphs: Havenova was founded in 2023 with a clear idea: to offer home cleaning and maintenance services in Berlin with the customer at the center.
From the beginning, the company has worked to stand out by focusing on customer experience and maintaining clear and professional communication at every stage of the service.

In its first years, Havenova has actively participated in the development of this digital platform together with Maped Solutions. This tool was created to simplify service requests, improve communication, and offer full transparency to users.
Our focus remains the same: to improve every day, adapt to the needs of our clients, and continue developing digital solutions that benefit both customers and companies in the sector.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Havenova?
whyChoose.description: At Havenova, we combine traditional services with modern transparency. Our goal is to make the entire process – from request to completion – as simple, reliable, and customer-focused as possible. The following points highlight what sets us apart from others.

points.title: Commitment to quality in every task

reviewsSection.title: Trusted by Berlin households.
reviewsSection.subtitle: See what our customers are saying.
reviewsSection.description: At Havenova, we continually strive to improve our services. Your feedback helps us develop better solutions and enhance our offerings.

list.label: Transparency
list.description: We believe in clear and honest communication at every stage – from inquiry to execution.

list.label: Quality
list.description: We deliver meticulous work with attention to detail and a strong commitment to professionalism.

list.label: Innovation
list.description: We actively contribute to the development of digital tools to enhance the customer experience.

list.label: Empathy
list.description: We foster professional yet human relationships with our clients, characterized by respect and understanding.

items.question: What services does Havenova offer?
items.answer: Havenova offers a wide range of home and property services in Berlin, including professional cleaning, small repairs, regular maintenance, and assistance with moving or furniture assembly. Our goal is to provide reliable and flexible support for both private households and businesses, so you can focus on what matters most while we take care of the rest.

items.question: How quickly can I book a service?
items.answer: Most services can be scheduled within 24–48 hours after we receive your request. Once you submit your details through our platform, our team reviews them and confirms an appointment that works best for you. For urgent cases, we always try to find the fastest possible solution.

items.question: Are your employees qualified and insured?
items.answer: Yes, all our team members and partner contractors are carefully selected, trained, and fully insured. This ensures that the work is carried out safely and professionally. We also work with trusted specialists for tasks such as electrical or painting work, so you always get the right expertise.

items.question: Are there discounts for members?
items.answer: Yes, Havenova members enjoy exclusive benefits such as up to 20% discounts on services, faster response times, and an annual apartment check-up. Membership is designed to give you more value and peace of mind throughout the year.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Find more detailed answers on our FAQ page or get in touch if your question is not listed.

finalCta.headline: Ready to simplify your home services?
finalCta.subheadline: Book a service today and enjoy professional support within 24–48 hours. Our trusted team takes care of cleaning, repairs, and maintenance so you can focus on what matters most.

cookieBanner.title: Cookies on this website
cookieBanner.description: We use essential cookies to ensure the website functions properly. With your permission, we also use analytics cookies to monitor site usage and improve user experience. We do not collect data for advertising or profiling.

steps.title: Request your service
steps.description: Fill out the form with the details of your request. We’ll review it and prepare a personalized offer for you.

steps.title: Schedule the first visit
steps.description: A team member will contact you to arrange a convenient time for the first inspection or consultation.

steps.title: Confirm the work appointment
steps.description: After the inspection, you’ll receive the final offer. Once confirmed, the work date will be scheduled.

steps.title: Service completed
steps.description: Our team performs the work professionally and efficiently. You’ll receive an invoice and can share your feedback.

header.title: Furniture Assembly
header.subtitle: Professional, fast and stress-free
header.description: Our experts handle the complete assembly of your furniture – from delivery to final setup. Book your appointment online and enjoy your newly arranged space effortlessly.

description.create: Your service request has been added successfully. You can go directly to checkout or continue exploring other services.
description.edit: Your request has been updated successfully.

invalid.title: Invalid data
invalid.description: Some fields contain invalid or incomplete information. Please review the form and try again.

unexpected.description: An unexpected error occurred while saving your request. Please try again later or contact support.

steps.description: Select the room where the furniture will be assembled.

steps.title: Furniture details
steps.description: Provide dimensions or any special instructions for assembly.

servicesList.title: Home Cleaning
servicesList.description: Thorough cleaning for apartments, houses, and offices – ideal for regular maintenance or deep cleaning.

servicesList.title: Property Maintenance
servicesList.description: Reliable upkeep and care of your property – from small repairs to complete facility maintenance.

servicesList.title: Furniture Assembly
servicesList.description: Fast and professional assembly of all types of furniture – safe, precise, and stress-free.

servicesList.title: Kitchen Assembly
servicesList.description: Professional installation of complete kitchens, including countertops, appliance connection, and on-site adjustments.

servicesList.title: Window Cleaning
servicesList.description: Streak-free cleaning for windows, glass surfaces, and conservatories – inside and out.

servicesList.title: Kitchen Cleaning
servicesList.description: Thorough and hygienic deep cleaning of your entire kitchen – including all appliances.

list.label: Transparency
list.description: We believe in clear and honest communication at every step, from booking to service delivery.

list.label: Quality
list.description: We are committed to delivering well-done work with attention to detail and professional standards.

list.label: Innovation
list.description: We actively contribute to the development of digital tools that enhance the customer experience.

list.label: Empathy
list.description: We maintain a professional yet human relationship with our clients, based on respect and understanding.

reviews.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Berlin
reviews.service: Kleine Handwerks- und Montageleistungen: Ausbessern; Sanitäre Installationen
reviews.comment: Sehr effizient und nett, jederzeit wieder gerne!

reviews.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Wriezen
reviews.comment: Hasan und sein Kollege haben bei meiner Enkeltochter einen Küchenblock aufgebaut und alle E-Geräte ordnungsgemäß angeschlossen. Sehr zufrieden mit der Arbeit. Am selben Tag erledigt, sehr freundlich und vielseitig. Sehr zu empfehlen.

reviews.author: Jonas Woelffer, Berlin
reviews.comment: Super Arbeit! Sehr kompetent, verlässlich und korrekt. Immer wieder sehr gerne!

reviews.author: MyHammer-Kunde
reviews.comment: Sehr gute Kommunikation, schnell und sauber erledigt.

reviews.author: Sven, Berlin
reviews.comment: Pünktlich, zuverlässig und freundlich. Jederzeit wieder!

reviews.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Potsdam
reviews.comment: Arbeit in Ordnung, aber kleine Verzögerung beim Termin.

reviews.author: Stefanie, Berlin
reviews.comment: Sehr zuverlässig, gute Kommunikation und saubere Arbeit. Jederzeit wieder!

reviews.author: Ali, Berlin
reviews.comment: Alles super gelaufen, sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Absolute Empfehlung.

reviews.author: Nico, Berlin
reviews.comment: Sehr freundlich, pünktlich und gute Arbeit. Kann ich weiterempfehlen.

reviews.author: MyHammer-Kunde
reviews.comment: Alles wie vereinbart, sauber und schnell ausgeführt.

reviews.author: Sabine, Berlin
reviews.comment: Sehr gute Arbeit, schnell und professionell. Vielen Dank!

reviews.author: MyHammer-Kunde
reviews.comment: Sehr gute Kommunikation und schnelle Hilfe. Gerne wieder.

reviews.author: Thomas, Berlin
reviews.comment: Sehr professionelle Arbeit, freundlich und kompetent. Kann ich nur empfehlen.

reviews.author: Katrin, Berlin
reviews.comment: Arbeit war gut, kleine Verzögerung beim Aufbau, aber insgesamt zufrieden.

reviews.author: Michael, Berlin
reviews.comment: Sehr gute Arbeit, schnell und freundlich. Jederzeit wieder.

reviews.author: MyHammer-Kunde
reviews.comment: Alles top erledigt, sehr zufrieden.

reviews.author: Elena, Berlin
reviews.comment: Sehr freundlicher Kontakt, Arbeit einwandfrei und zuverlässig. Sehr empfehlenswert!

reviews.author: MyHammer-Kunde
reviews.comment: Alles bestens, sehr gute Arbeit. Vielen Dank!

reviews.author: Frank, Berlin
reviews.service: Kleine Handwerks- und Montageleistungen: Küchenzeile mit Hängeschränken
reviews.comment: Reinigungsmeister würde ich eine 10 geben, Da es die nicht gibt gebe ich volle Punktzahl 5 Sterne Sehr pünktlich, angenehme Kommunikation bei Kontaktaufnahme und bei der Ausführung des Auftrag. Sehr sauber und schnell gearbeitet. Jungs macht weiter so !!! Kann ich mit guten Gewissen weiter empfehlen. Merci für die tolle Arbeit :)

reviews.author: Apu, Berlin
reviews.service: Auf- und Abbau von Fertigmöbeln und Fertigteilen: 3 Möbelstücke
reviews.comment: Reinigungsmeister hat bei uns diverse Möbel aufgebaut. Die Kommunikation war angenehm und unproblematisch. Er hat die Arbeit zur vollen Zufriedenheit erledigt. Gerne wieder!
